title: Dereca: Set Me Straight
description: She’s been an author, psychic, Yelp reviewer, bus driver, former Yelp reviewer who got banned for using too many obscenities in a review for a children’s theatre, and a reader of half of one of Iyanla Vanzant’s books. She’s done the work and will help you do yours.
quote: What we need now is a man. That’s what the ladies want, and that’s what the mama in your heart wants.
alt1: Dereca scowling next to a man’s face
alt2: Dereca holding a man’s chin close to her face and yelling
alt4: P. Ninny with her face in Dereca’s breasts
